LOGIN.resetmessage:
Please provide the username or email address that you used when you signed
      up for your Evernote account.
LOGIN.title: Login
LOGIN.usernamemess: Warning: the username CAN NOT be changed after registration, but after, the account can be deleted and remade new :)

Gallery.message1: Do you want to post all of your NFTs?
Gallery.message2: All users can now admire your pieces of art!

GalleryDetail.message1: Do you want to delete your NFT? Choose wisely
GalleryDetail.message2: After accepting, the NFT will be deleted forever and you will not be able to recover it in any way possible

NewItem.title: Upload failed
NewItem.message: There was a problem uploading your avatar

SellItem.message1: Your item is being published on the shop
SellItem.message2: The price can be numeric only

Login.title: Login failed
Login.message: Email or Password must be wrong, please try again or create a new account if you're not registered yet!

Register.title: Registration failed
Register.message1: Please check if you have typed a valid email (ex: example@email.com) and/or a valid password (it requires a minimum length of 6) and try again!
Register.message2: The username you typed in is already taken, please pick a different one
Register.message3: The username field cannot accept any other characters other than digits and uppercase and lowercase letters

EditProfile.message1: There was a problem uploading your avatar
EditProfile.message2: There was a problem uploading your infos
EditProfile.message4: Do you want to delete your profile? Chose wisely
EditProfile.message5: After accepting, this profile will stay untouched but your credentials will be deleted forever and you will not be able to access your profile anymore
